title: I, Who Transmigrated As The Vicious Cannon Fodder Was Forced To Enter The Shura Field
alternative_title: Chuan Cheng Edu Paohui De Wo Bei Po Kaiqi Xiuluo Chang ; I, Who Transmigrated as the Vicious Cannon Fodder Was Forced to Enter the Shura Field ; I, Who Was Transported Into the Vicious Cannon Fodder, Forced to Start a Love Complex ; Chuān Chéng Èdú Pàohuī De Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāiqǐ Xiūluō Chǎng ; 穿成恶毒炮灰的我被迫开启修罗场
status: Chuan Cheng Edu Paohui De Wo Bei Po Kaiqi Xiuluo Chang ; I, Who Transmigrated as the Vicious Cannon Fodder Was Forced to Enter the Shura Field ; I, Who Was Transported Into the Vicious Cannon Fodder, Forced to Start a Love Complex ; Chuān Chéng Èdú Pàohuī De Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāiqǐ Xiūluō Chǎng ; 穿成恶毒炮灰的我被迫开启修罗场
description:
Description :
        Freshly graduated university student Ji Ci unexpectedly finds himself in the role of a villainous supporting character in a popular Jiang literature novel. Determined to stay safe, Ji Ci tries to get close to the junior brother. To his surprise, the  is not only incredibly beautiful but also kind-hearted. Ji Ci vows to protect him, but the junior brother falls for him and declares he will love only Ji Ci for the rest of his life. As a result, everyone who used to be obsessed with the junior brother now turns their attentiontoJiCi.
